entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
